resources.string: Please select your date and time of birth to enable your biorhythms
To view you biorhythms please select your date and time of birth using the buttons below. If you don\'t know your time of birth you don\'t need to select one and midnight will be used instead
Daily biorhythms page displays a column chart with your Physical, Emotional and Intellectual biorhythms scores for today
Weekly biorhythms page displays a spline chart with your Physical, Emotional and Intellectual biorhythms scores for today, the last 3 days and next 3 days
Long term biorhythms page displays a spline chart with your Physical, Emotional and Intellectual biorhythms scores for today, the last 15 days and next 15 days
